alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:27PM MDT until July 10 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1024 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Tilford to 3 miles northeast of Johnson Siding, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 1020 PM MDT, ping-pong ball sized hail and 58 mph wind gusts were reported 1 mile north- northwest of Piedmont. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Rapid City around 1030 PM MDT. Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base and Box Elder around 1035 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Rapid City Airport, Caputa, Farmingdale, Viewfield, Curlew Lake, Owanka, Wicksville and Wasta. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 30 and 98. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
